name: Magic: The Gathering Arena
description:
Installs the latest version of MTGA that is listed on https://mtgarena.downloads.wizards.com/Live/Windows32/version
Also can be used to update a existing installation

task.description: Installing .NET 4.7.2. This will take a while...
task.name: winetricks

write_file.content:
#!/bin/bash 
 OUTPUT=$1 
 VERSIONSITE="https://mtgarena.downloads.wizards.com/Live/Windows32/version" 
 VERSIONKEY="CurrentInstallerURL" 
 MSIURL=$(curl $VERSIONSITE | grep $VERSIONKEY | sed -r 's/(\s*"[^\"]+":\s*")([^\"]+)(",?\s*)/\2/g') 
 wget $MSIURL -O $OUTPUT

task.name: wineexec
task.exclude_processes: mscorsvw.exe rundll32.exe rpcss.exe powershell.exe UnityCrashHandler32.exe svchost.exe

content:
files:
- setup: https://mtgarena.downloads.wizards.com/Live/Windows32/version
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Wizards of the Coast/MTGA/MTGA.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet472
    description: Installing .NET 4.7.2. This will take a while...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    key: GrabFullscreen
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\X11 Driver
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: Y
- task:
    key: UseTakeFocus
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\X11 Driver
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: N
- task:
    app: powershell arial d3dcompiler_47 win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- write_file:
    content: "#!/bin/bash \n OUTPUT=$1 \n VERSIONSITE=\"https://mtgarena.downloads.wizards.com/Live/Windows32/version\"\
      \ \n VERSIONKEY=\"CurrentInstallerURL\" \n MSIURL=$(curl $VERSIONSITE | grep\
      \ $VERSIONKEY | sed -r 's/(\\s*\"[^\\\"]+\":\\s*\")([^\\\"]+)(\",?\\s*)/\\2/g')\
      \ \n wget $MSIURL -O $OUTPUT \n"
    file: $CACHE/download.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/download.sh
- execute:
    args: $CACHE/MTGAInstaller.msi
    description: Downloading Installer ...
    file: $CACHE/download.sh
- task:
    args: /i "$CACHE/MTGAInstaller.msi"
    description: Installing/Updating Magic the Gathering Arena ...
    exclude_processes: mscorsvw.exe rundll32.exe rpcss.exe powershell.exe UnityCrashHandler32.exe
      svchost.exe
    executable: msiexec
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  Desktop: true
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  version: lutris-mtga-4.21-x86_64
